forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers this morning...overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain likely. High 11C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...scattered thunderstorms during the morning. A steady rain will arrive this afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 51F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 41F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain with thunderstorms by evening. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
